channel.title: CVE Feed for Measuresoft -- ScadaPro Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Measuresoft -- ScadaPro Server

item.title: CVE-2022-3263|2024-08-03T01:07:05.988Z -- measuresoft -- scadapro%20server
item.description: The security descriptor of Measuresoft ScadaPro Server version 6.7 has inconsistent permissions, which could allow a local user with limited privileges to modify the service binary path and start malicious commands with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2022-2894|2024-08-03T00:52:59.982Z -- measuresoft -- scadapro%20server
item.description: Measuresoft ScadaPro Server (All Versions) uses unmaintained ActiveX controls. The controls may allow seven untrusted pointer deference instances while processing a specific project file.

item.title: CVE-2022-2896|2024-08-03T00:52:59.889Z -- measuresoft -- scadapro%20server
item.description: Measuresoft ScadaPro Server (All Versions) allows use after free while processing a specific project file.

item.title: CVE-2022-2892|2024-08-03T00:52:59.497Z -- measuresoft -- scadapro%20server
item.description: Measuresoft ScadaPro Server (Versions prior to 6.8.0.1) uses an unmaintained ActiveX control, which may allow an out-of-bounds write condition while processing a specific project file.

item.title: CVE-2022-2895|2024-08-03T00:53:00.462Z -- measuresoft -- scadapro%20server
item.description: Measuresoft ScadaPro Server (All Versions) uses unmaintained ActiveX controls. These controls may allow two stack-based buffer overflow instances while processing a specific project file.
